settings.heading: We Didn't Invent This. Thai Herbalists Did â€” Over 100 Years Ago.

settings.text: In Thailand, these herbal sticks aren't alternative medicine. They're the medicine. Every taxi driver, every street vendor, every grandmother carries one.
We brought this formula to the West because we were tired of watching people choose between chemicals that don't work and coffee that makes them jittery.
Every Lom Thai stick contains the same 5 ingredients Thai healers have used for a century. Nothing added. Nothing synthetic. Nothing to pronounce.

settings.name: Founder Name
settings.story: I first discovered ya dom in a Bangkok pharmacy in 2019. One inhale and I understood why every Thai person carries one. I spent two years working with traditional herbalists to bring this exact formula to the West.

settings.text: We're not a wellness startup. We're a bridge between ancient Thai relief and modern Western lives.
